name: ZigZag (itch) (PonokefaloS)
description:
How to play : "Enter" to start the game , "Space" to turn the character left/right, "Escape" to pause the game.

Stay on the wall and do as many zigzags as you can!
Just press space to change the direction of the character. Try not to fall off the edges!
How far can you go?

Any feedback is welcome and appreciated, thanks for playing my game.
